data: `minecraft:behavior.move_to_block` allows a mob to move towards a block.

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

data.Name: on_reach
data.Description: Event to run on block reached.

data.Name: on_stay_completed
data.Description: Event to run on completing a stay of stay_duration at the block.

data.Name: search_height
data.Description: The height in blocks that the mob will look for the block.

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: The distance in blocks that the mob will look for the block.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

data.Name: start_chance
data.Description: Chance to start the behavior (applied after each random tick_interval).

data.Name: stay_duration
data.Description: Number of ticks needed to complete a stay at the block.

data.Name: target_offset
data.Description: Offset to add to the selected target position.

data.Name: target_selection_method
data.Description: Kind of block to find fitting the specification. Valid values are "random" and "nearest".

data.Name: tick_interval
data.Description: Average interval in ticks to try to run this behavior.
